about.title: About me üßôüèª
paragraphs: I am a proud father & husband located in Jupiter, Florida.

I have over a decade of experience as a software engineer & team builder. I have overseen product development, ran large distributed engineering teams, and have significant experience surrounding ecommerce and software-as-a-service. I have worked on dozens of ecommerce implementations for large retail brands, and successfully scaled an enterprise B2B ecommerce solution to over 100 million dollars per year in transactions.
I am always looking to grow as an engineer and a leader, hear about interesting projects and opportunities, and meeting like-minded people. Feel free to drop me a line.
Visit my LinkedIn page to see career details.

highlights.title: Highlights üèÜ
items: Currently Lead Software Engineer at The Learning Experience, where I lead a team responsible for building awesome products for children & their parents.
Previously Director of Development at multiplica.us. Responsible for all client development, as well as an international team of 10 earthlings.

Previously Development Manager for ecommerce at Gemaire Distributors, a Division of Watsco Inc (NYSE:WSO). Responsible for enterprise B2B ecommerce product built with Magento EE1.14. Involved in two Magento Excellence awards.

Previously Team Lead at HiConversion. Responsible for 5 person frontend team working with high-end retail brands such as Pier 1, National Geographic, L‚ÄôOreal, Puma, and Finishline on the Demandware ecommerce platform (now SalesForce Commerce Cloud).

site.title: About this site üíª
site.description: This site is built with GatsbyJS using gatsby-starter-blog. This site uses Bulma CSS, Font Awesome, and Formspree. This site is hosted on Amazon S3, and currently deployed using Travis CI. Source code can be found on GitHub.
